ovdesc.p: This application is used to create new SEAT.SCRIPTS based on the values given in its fields, this is a VERIFY template. This will create new scripts in Hold status on verifying the template.

desc.p: Any ID with Alpha-Numeric values . Upto 10 characters are allowed.
This will be a valid field name in the application which will be added in the new scripts . Upto 35 characters are allowed
This should be a valid script in SEAT.SCRIPTS application, this record is used to create new scripts. This is a mandatory field. Upto 35 characters are allowed
Description of what is intended in creating this record.This is a mandatory field with a minimum of 3 to a maximum of 35 characters.
This will be a valid record in SEAT.SCRIPT.BUILD.PARAMS which will have the different values for the field specified in APP.FIELD.NAME. Upto 75 characters are allowed
This will be a valid record in SEAT.SCRIPT.BUILD.PARAMS; this will have all the functions and SEAT.SCRIPT.GROUPS that will be used in the new scripts.Upto 75 characters are allowed.
This will default the application of the SEAT.SCRIPT that is given in BASE.SCRIPT.ID. This is a NO-INPUT field.
